AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States-Mexico border: International boundary where roving Border Patrol stops are conducted, proximity to which is a factor in determining reasonable suspicion
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Farm-to-Market Road 2050 area: rural area characterized by ranches and a wind farm, with limited traffic, where vehicles with out-of-town registrations raised suspicions
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Farm-to-Market Road 2050: a two-lane road where observations were made, with sharp turns and no shoulder, used by ranchers and oil trucks, location of drop-offs for illegal aliens, has a wind farm with an office and entrance on the west side
